reviewText: I fell in love with this series as a child and ended up buying all the tapes before DVDs became standard format about 9 years ago.  Great family friendly series!  My very conservative pastor uncle was insulted by the natives' lack of clothing, but nothing is shown and I find it quite tasteful.  They are island people!  It's hot!  Come on.  Your kids are going to be too mesmerized by the scenery and the story to notice.
